name: Stable Video Diffusion Generator
author: AWENK AUDICO & Gemini
description: Generates short video clips from a starting image using the Stable Video Diffusion (SVD) model.

properties.label: Input Image from Variable
properties.description: Payload variable path containing the starting image for the video.

properties.label: Output Folder
properties.description: The folder where the generated video will be saved. If empty, a default folder will be used.

properties.label: Motion Bucket ID
properties.description: Controls the amount of motion in the video (e.g., 127).

properties.label: Noise Aug Strength
properties.description: Amount of noise added to the input image (e.g., 0.02).

output_schema.name: data.video_path
output_schema.description: The full local path to the generated MP4 video file.
